item.content:encoded:
I did it! I finally found time to actually put up a blog. As part of loving the simplicity of the old web and as a avid complainer of how modern websites are way to bloated, I’ve made an attemt at keepubg this blog as simple as possible.

Instead of spinning my own theme I ended up using a pre-made one, simpliy because I found one that had exactly what I needed and nothing else. The styling is simple and it’s one of the few themes out there without any JS. The theme can be found over at GitHub

So what can you expect from this blog? Well… I won’t promise too much, but I will at least try to use it as a personal journal where I share my thoughs and notes on everything ranging from how to configure IRC bouncers to why I think AI right now is just a fad.
